issue.title: [Rust]: Benchmark and improve count_set_bits function
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10079](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10079). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
`count_set_bits` and `count_set_bits_offset` currently use a lookup table for each byte. I'm thinking it should be more efficient to iterate the data in larger chunks and use the builtin `count_ones` function.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10079?focusedCommentId=17232229) by Neville Dipale (nevi_me):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8663
